This is the story of a self-made man who, armed with vision, resilience, and relentless ambition, rises from humble beginnings to become the leader of a global empire.

Amid a battlefield of wealth, power, and betrayal, he must navigate not only fierce competitors but also the shadows within his own heart. Every decision he makes is a gamble â€” one that could either build an empire or tear it all down.

This is a journey of growth, strategy, and redemption â€” a tale of a CEO who dares to chase greatness, only to discover the true cost of ambition.

In the end, will he claim glory â€” or be left with only solitude?

shows.title: Fall Into Sweet Trap
shows.description: A contract marriage, two hearts drawing closer. Caitlin, struggling to survive office politics and her ex-husband's betrayal. Simon, tasked with revitalizing his family's business. When fate leads them into a loveless marriage, will they continue to abide by the contract or bravely pursue their true feelings?

shows.title: Rebirth: Hunting Crimes Album
shows.description: In a secluded mountain village, women working as schoolteachers are being brutally murdered. Andria and her friend Sasha are newly appointed teachers in the same village. Soon after they arrive, Andria begins having unsettling dreams that seem to reveal the horrors unfolding around them. As fear closes in, Andria is caught by a group targeting female teachers while Sasha narrowly escapes. But the mystery deepens: who are these ruthless killers, and why are they hunting women in this isolated village?

shows.title: Guardian Angel: Mom on the Move
shows.description: Yara was tricked into having a child with Yusuf, but her sister Yulia took the baby and lied about its death. Years later, Yara returns and reunites with Yusuf and the child. When Yulia's abuse of the child is uncovered, she causes a car accident in a panic. Yusuf then learns that Yara is the biological mother, and the family comes together to live happily.

shows.title: Single but Pregnant: An Unexpected Husband
shows.description: After becoming pregnant with the empire's heir, a young woman navigates unexpected challenges and newfound affection from the entire empire. Thrust into a world of intrigue and adoration, she must protect her unborn child while uncovering the truth behind her mysterious circumstances.

shows.title: Lucifer my boyfriend from hell
shows.description: The King of Hell, Lucifer, made a bet with his brother, the Seraph Gabriel. Lucifer predicted humanity would be corrupted by sin in the new millennium and face destruction, while Gabriel predicted they would thrive. God helped Gabriel win, punishing Lucifer by scattering his soul on Earth. A fragment of Lucifer's soul entered a baby girl born in an orphanage during the millennium. To reclaim his soul, Lucifer left Hell...

shows.title: Cute Baby Assists: I Help My Mom Marry the President Tycoon
shows.description: A cute baby becomes Cupid and helps his mom get married to a billionaire daddy. will the cutie succeed?
shows.link: /json/Cute Baby Assists_ I Help My Mom Marry the President Tycoon-Tamil.json

shows.title: Eternal Life for Three Millennia
shows.description: If you want to know what it would be like if a man had been alive for three thousand years, you must watch this series!

shows.title: HOW I BECAME THE ALPHA QUEEN
shows.description: Lilith was set to lead the Silver Claw pack, but her sister Serena betrayed her, killing their parents and framing Lilith to steal the Alpha title. Branded a rogue, Lilith finds safetyâ€”and loveâ€”with Tristan, the kind Alpha of the Starlight pack. Together, they uncover Serenaâ€™s lies, bring her down, and unite their packs.

shows.title: My Tycoon husband Spoils Me
shows.description: She's the CEO's wife, and her one-night stand turns out to be her husband whom she's never met in their three-year marriage. But when she wakes up, he doesn't recognize her at all and asks for a divorce...

shows.title: Stop Pretending! Miss Gu will Expose Everything
shows.description: In a world where legacy and ambition collide, the heiress of the powerful Kings Corp joins Stream Corp as an undercover intern to prove her worth. But her journey takes a sharp turn when two mysterious interns show up sharing the same identity. As secrets unravel and loyalties blur, corporate games become a dangerous masquerade.
shows.link: /json/Stop Pretending Miss Gu will Expose Everything-Tamil.json

shows.title: Lost in Love
shows.description: anu engaged to Ethan. but when she found out Ethan cheats her with her sister, she seeks revenge by getting along with Ethan's brother, Santhosh. When Santhosh finds her true intention, he refuses to accept her; however, later he falls in love with her and wants to marry her

shows.title: Star Moon Romance: Rejected And Reborn As Alpha
shows.description: Wolfless Phoebe was wrongly accused of murdering her parents and was ostracized by the whole pack. Even her lover Asta rejected her as his mate. Crushed, Phoebe left her pack and became a rogue. However, in her despair, she awakened the formidable Moonshadow Wolf. Two years later, Phoebe emerged as a renowned female Alpha, just when a distress call from her former lover Asta reached her. As she stared back at her past in the face, the truth about her parents' tragic death began to surface.
shows.link: /json/Star Moon Romance_ Rejected And Reborn As Alpha-Tamil.json

shows.title: Overcoming Obstacles: The Counter attack On The Twin Babies
shows.description: Once torn apart by betrayal, a young mother and her newborn twins were left to face a cruel fate. Thought to be lost, the children survive  growing up far from the love they deserved. But destiny has other plans. Years later, the twins return. Behind their innocent smiles lie brave hearts filled with love for the mother they never knew  and a quiet determination to make things right. As they search for the truth and fight for justice, they cross paths with a kind stranger who becomes their strongest ally.This is a heartfelt journey of hope, healing, and the unbreakable bond between a mother and her children  told through the eyes of two remarkable little souls who refuse to let go of love.
shows.link: /json/Overcoming Obstacles_ The Counter attack On The Twin Babies-Tamil.json

shows.title: Marriage A Debt
shows.description: Reborn on her wedding day with a thirst for revenge, heiress An Ran takes control of her destiny, joining forces with rival CEO Jiang Jingyuan to reclaim her stolen life and, in the process, discovers unexpected love and redemption.
